text:
Everyone!
Thank you for participating today!

There are various
events planned, so...

Please enjoy
them to the fullestâ™ª

The first event is~...
the 'Egg Hunt'!

Eggs shaped capsules are hidden
in the designated area, so find them!

The person who finds the most
will receive a wonderful gift from us.

The time limit is 30 minutes!
Alright, ready... set... go!
